original: Borgström, Gustaf Ferdinand, postmästare, Falkenberg, f. 21/12/81 i Falkenberg av Erik Alfred B. o. Anna Maria Lund. G. 19 m. Signe Maria Larsson. Barn: Margit Ingegerd f. 20, Ingrid Maria Agneta 22, Signe Gunnel Isabel 25. — Stud. v. Boston High School i Boston, USA, samt avlagt kompl. mog:ex. i vissa ämnen i Halmstad. E. o. postexp. i södra distr. 03, e. bitr. i Kalmar 05, Laholm 06, v. järnv:posten i Östra distr. 07, tf. postexp. där 08, postexp. där 09, i Falkenberg 14, Ronneby 22, postassist. där 25, stat:mäst. i Sjöbo 34, postmästare i Huskvarna 38-47. GMnr.
translated: Borgström, Gustaf Ferdinand, postmaster, Falkenberg, b. 21/12/81 in Falkenberg to Erik Alfred B. and Anna Maria Lund. Married in 1919 to Signe Maria Larsson. Children: Margit Ingegerd b. 1920, Ingrid Maria Agneta b. 1922, Signe Gunnel Isabel b. 1925. Studied at Boston High School in Boston, USA, and completed high school exams in certain subjects in Halmstad. Became a trainee postal clerk in the southern district in 1903, assistant postal clerk in Kalmar in 1905, Laholm in 1906, transferred to the railway post office in the Eastern district in 1907, acting postal clerk there in 1908, appointed postal clerk there in 1909, worked in Falkenberg in 1914, Ronneby in 1922, appointed postal assistant there in 1925, state postmaster in Sjöbo in 1934, and postal master in Huskvarna from 1938 to 1947. GMnr.
